name: Far Cry 5: Resistance Edition
summary:
Brought to you in collaboration with Tri-Force, the Far Cry 5 Resistance Edition includes five exclusive, iconic Hope County collectibles and a copy of the Far Cry 5 SteelBook Gold Edition game. An instant collector's item, the Far Cry 5 Resistance Edition is exclusively available at GameStop in limited quantities. Don't wait - join the Resistance today!

Far Cry 5 Resistance Edition includes:

Far Cry 5 SteelBook Gold Edition game, including all Deluxe add-on content, the Season Pass, and a collectible SteelBook case.

16.5-inch premium statue featuring highly detailed reproductions of Resistance members Nick Rye and Boomer the dog.

High-quality Hope County flag bandana and logo pin collectibles so you can wear your allegiance for all to see.

A souvenir Koozie and a set of three exclusive postcards to commemorate your trip to Hope County.

Premium collector's box packaging.
